description.text:
Attacks the enemy with a spear, before increasing Attack of the caster for 1 turn. When the caster is defied, activates Disappear as an extra attack. Disappear can only be activated once per turn, during the caster's turn. 
Disappear: Attacks the enemy with a swordstorm, and when the enemy is defeated, increases Combat Readiness of the caster by 50%. Penetrates the target's Defense by 50%.
description.text_ja: 敵単体に攻撃し、自身に攻撃力UPを1ターンの間付与する。自身が神威状態の場合、【滅せよ】を発動する。【滅せよ】は自身のターンに1回まで発動する。滅せよ：敵単体を攻撃する。このスキルで敵を気絶させた場合、自身のアクションゲージを50%UPさせる。対象の防御力を50%貫通する。

description.text: At the start of the first battle, increases Combat Readiness by 10%. Unaffected by effects that reduce Combat Readiness increases the caster receives.
description.text_ja: 初回のバトル開始時、アクションゲージが10%UPする。自身が受けるアクションゲージ増加量をDOWNさせる効果の影響を受けない。

description.text:
Dispels two buffs from the enemy before attacking, silencing for 1 turn and decreasing Combat Readiness by 30%. Grants deify to the caster for 3 turns. Penetrates the targets Defense by 100% and cannot trigger a critical hit. When the target is a Hero, damage dealt increases proportional to the targets current Health. 
Deify: When attacking, increases Critical Hit Chance by 50%, and when attacked, decreases damage suffered by 50%. When more than one damage reduction effect is granted, only the strongest effect is applied. Deify cannot be dispelled.
description.burn: Dispels all buffs from the target. (-10 Souls)
description.multipliers:
Proportional damage based on target current hp: 18.75% (0.1875 * Target Current Health)
                                        
                                                                                    Penetration: 100%
description.text_ja: 敵単体の強化効果を2つ解除した後、攻撃し、沈黙を1ターンの間付与し、アクションゲージを30%DOWNさせる。自身に神威を3ターンの間付与する。対象の防御力を100%貫通する。このスキルはクリティカルが発生しない。対象が英雄の場合、対象の現在生命力が高いほどダメージがUPする。
description.burn_ja: 対象の強化効果をすべて解除する。(魂力10消費)
